1�What are you doing here? This is no place for civilians.
1�Ahhh, so you're military tactician who who drew up the plans for this latest supply mission.Why don't we ask one of the men how its going, shall we?
1�What are you doing here? This is no place for civilians.
1�Ahhh, so you're military tactician who who drew up the plans for this latest supply mission.Why don't we ask one of the men how its going, shall we?

1�Ahhh, so you're military tactician who who drew up the plans for this latest supply mission.Why don't we ask one of the men how its going, shall we?
1�What are you doing here? This is no place for civilians.
1�Greetings. I am 	 of the San d'Orian Provincial Knights.
1�Greetings. I am 	 of the Bastokan Legion.
1�Greetings. I am 	 of the Federation of Windurst.
1�Greetings. I am 	, Campaign Arbiter for the Allied Forces.
1�What can I help you with?Nothing.Performance assessment.New Allied Tags.Temporary items.Union registration.Teleportation.Information on the Allied Campaign.
1�You've already undergone an evaluation for this battle, or had you forgotten?As much as I'd like to, I'm forbidden from providing you with a new set of Allied Taegs until the next battle begins.

�!�I am sorry,  , but your campaign medal has expired. I cannot issue tags to anyone not authorized by the Allied Forces. Return to your nation's capital and speak with a Campaign Evaluation Official.

�!�I am sorry,  , but your campaign medal has expired. I cannot issue tags to anyone not authorized by the Allied Forces. Return to your nation's capital and speak with a Campaign Evaluation Official.
1�Register for a union?No.Yes.
1�What will you do?Nothing.Transfer to another union.Resign union membership.

1�Your steadfast efforts have earned you a claim to share in your union's spoils of war.By  �[transferring to another union/resigning from your union], you will relinquish this right.It is not my place to question your decision, but I suggest you pay the matter due heed.
1� �[Transfer unions/Resign from your current union]?No.Yes.

1�Your steadfast efforts have earned you a claim to share in your union's spoils of war.By  �[transferring to another union/resigning from your union], you will relinquish this right.It is not my place to question your decision, but I suggest you pay the matter due heed.
1� �[Transfer unions/Resign from your current union]?No.Yes.

1�I am afraid that all unions are currently at their maximum enrollment, and unable to accept new recruits.For better or for worse, though, I suspect it shall not be long before we are in need of some new blood.Such is the nature of war...

1�Register for which union?None.Adder Union (

1�Step right up, �[mister/lady]!No, don't tell me: yer lookin' for a Hume broad.
1�'Bout yea tall? Sword on her hip?Sure, I know where she's lyin' low.
1�'Fraid that information's classified: beastmen and hellspawn only, ya see?Hey, the Shadow Lord makes the rules 'round here, not me!

1�'Course, I just might be able to make an exception for a friendly �[chap/lady] who brought me 
 	)��������...
1�Whoa now! What's with the cynical stare?Could it be that...<gasp>...you don't trust me?
1�Why, you wound me! Deeply, like.Just because my buddy to the  �[southeast/northwest/north/west] is a two-faced trickster, doesn't mean all us imps are!
1�I'm wounded. Deeply, like.Why, I couldn't tell a lie if ya paid me! Well, depends on how much...
1�Why, you wound me! Deeply, like.Just because my buddy to the  �[southeast/northwest/north/west] is a two-faced trickster, doesn't mean all us imps are!
1�Bah, fine, don't believe me!No skin off my wings.
1�Oh, look...another Allied soldier.How dreadfully exciting.
1�Let me guess: you're searching for someone and need my help.Oh, will the fun ever stop? <Yawn>...
1�Does it look like I'm running a charity here?

1�Bring me 
 	)��������, then we can talk.If I feel like it.
1�Look at that expression on your face.Why, it's as if you don't trust me.
1�Fine. then go see my friend to the  �[east/north] of here.He's as honest as they come.
1�Here's a free tip: don't judge an imp by his cover.My buddy to the  �[southeast/northwest/north/west] talks the talk, but he couldn't tell the truth if his life depended on it.
1�Trust me or don't trust me.I won't lose any sleep over not helpin' a wingless one.
1�Fine. then go see my friend to the  �[east/north] of here.He's as honest as they come.
1�Yeeeeees? You have business with me, you do?
1�You look for Hume woman, hmmmmmm?Maybe I know where she is. Maybe I don't.
1�Either way, too bad!Boss would have Rokke's tail for blabbin' our secrets to a wingless one, seeeeee?

1�Or maybe you make it worth my while?Bring Rokke 
 shiny 	)��������, perhaps?
1�Shiny, shiny #����, yes.Rokke tell you everything he know.
1�What? My buddy up  �[southeast/northwest/north/west] tell you same thing?Oh, don't trust him, no no no.
1�You meet my friend Rikke, yes? Northwesty of here?He smart. He honest too.
1�What? My buddy up  �[southeast/northwest/north/west] tell you same thing?Oh, don't trust him, no no no.
1�You trust Rokke, yes?Rokke no lie to no one.
1�Well, looky who's back. And with  $����, t' boot.Decided to trust ol' Rikke, did ya?
1�Listen up, then. I'll tell ya all I know about yer Klara lady..........6 And that's all I know.
1�You wingless ones really ain't too bright, are ya?Didn't yer mommy ever tell ya not to trust an imp?
1�Well, looky who's back. And with  $����, t' boot.Decided to trust ol' Rikke, did ya?
1�A shrewd decision, my friend. Astute, even.
1�That Klara lady is lyin' low up aboveIn a corner of the southwest chamber, like.
1�I'd tell ya more, but the boss, he don't let us lackeys get too close.Not even the smart ones like yers truly.
1�Don't blame him, though.If word got out that he was usin' a mortal for his plans, things might get all complicated-like.
1�...And that's all I'm gonna say on the matter.No hard feelings, but I like my wings attached to my body, thankyaverymuch.
1� ! Did you truly get one of those shifty little fiends to talk?
1�I bow to your superior interrogation skills.At any rate, we mustn't delay.
1�I'll round up Volker and the others.We rendezvous at the location of which the imp spoke. Be safe,  !
1�You want a pat on the back? A cookie, perhaps?
1�What, you actually thought I'd tell you where the woman is?Maybe I would, if I knew...or cared. Now scram.
1�Am I supposed to give you a round of applause or something?
1�Oh, the Hume woman.Yeah, I saw her up above, in the southwest chamber. Or somewhere around there.
1�I'd tell you more if I knew. Or cared.
1�Beats me why the boss needs a Hume for his plans.If he's having fun, more power to him.
1�You could go see for yourself and leave me alone.That'd be just super.
1� ! Did you truly get one of those shifty little fiends to talk?
1�I bow to your superior interrogation skills.At any rate, we mustn't delay.
1�I'll round up Volker and the others.We rendezvous at the location of which the imp spoke. Be safe,  !
1�Oh, it's you. You bring shiny #���� for Rokke, yeeeeees?
1�You nice �[guy/lady].Too bad Rokke not actually know anything.
1�Rokke just make funny. Ha ha, hee hee, you know?Hm? You not laughing...
1�Oh, it's you. You bring shiny #���� for Rokke, yeeeeees?
1�Okay, promise is promise, yes it is....What was promise again?
1�Oh! Hume woman. Yes yes, I know.She up above, in secret place. Southwest chamber, you know?
1�You need know more? You go yourself.Boss no let Rokke get too close, no.
1�I no know what boss be thinking, using Hume for his plans.Then again, boss no pay Rokke to know, no?
1�But Rokke know one thing: you go there, you be very, veeery careful, yes?You be careful...or you be dead.
1� ! Did you truly get one of those shifty little fiends to talk?
1�I bow to your superior interrogation skills.At any rate, we mustn't delay.
1�I'll round up Volker and the others.We rendezvous at the location of which the imp spoke. Be safe,  !

1�Let me guess: you're searching for someone and need my help.Oh, will the fun ever stop? <Yawn>...
1�Does it look like I'm running a charity here?
1�Fine. then go see my friend to the  �[east/north] of here.He's as honest as they come.
1�Here's a free tip: don't judge an imp by his cover.My buddy to the  �[southeast/northwest/north/west] talks the talk, but he couldn't tell the truth if his life depended on it.
1�Intruder alert! Intruder alert!Woooooo! Woooooo!
1�...Or that's what I'd say if I weren't on break.Move along now. Nothin' to see here!
1�Ya'd have better luck gettin' the lowdown from the Shadow Lord himself than trustin' a word that comes out of the mouth of the swindler to th'  �[southeast/northwest/north/west] of me.
1�Look into these eyes.Do they look like lyin' eyes to you? Wait, don't answer that...
1�Ya'd have better luck gettin' the lowdown from the Shadow Lord himself than trustin' a word that comes out of the mouth of the swindler to th'  �[southeast/northwest/north/west] of me.
1�You again? Didn't I already tell ya that your lady is up above, in the southwest chamber?
1�Now scram, before the boss makes a Rikkebab outta me for talkin' to you!
1�You wingless ones really ain't too bright, are ya?Didn't yer mommy ever tell ya not to trust an imp?
1�Saw through our little ruse, did ya?Ya got a better head on yer shoulders than most wingless ones, I'll give ya that.
1�Oh, now you come back, do ya? ��Oh, Rikke! How could I ever have doubted you?��Bah! Yer a day late and about a hundred beastcoins short, �[mister/lady].
1�Sleeping on the job? Perish the thought!I was just, uh, lulling the enemy into a false sense of security. Yeah, that's the ticket...
1�If you don't trust me, go see my friend to the  �[east/north] of here.He's as honest as they come.
1�My buddy to the  �[southeast/northwest/north/west] talks the talk, but he couldn't tell the truth if his life depended on it.
1�If you don't trust me, go see my friend to the  �[east/north] of here.He's as honest as they come.
1�That woman you were looking for?Yeah, I saw her in the southwest chamber up above. Or somewhere around there.
1�But didn't I already tell you that?Gee, my head hurts...
1�What, you actually thought I'd tell you where the woman is?Maybe I would, if I knew...or cared. Now scram.
1�Oh, so one of the others helped you.That's just great. Wonderful. Bully for you.
1�Back to beg for my help, are you?You must have confused me with someone who cares...
1�Eleventy-three intruders, eleventy-four--No, wait... Eleventy-five?
1�Stupid wingless one! Always scamper and scurry back and forth, make Rokke lose count!Boss not gonna be happy about this...
1�My buddy  �[southeasty/northwesty/northy/westy] of here say he help you?Oh, don't trust him, no no no.
1�You meet my friend Rikke, yes? Northwesty of here?He smart. He honest too.
1�My buddy  �[southeasty/northwesty/northy/westy] of here say he help you?Oh, don't trust him, no no no.
1�You back again? You forget what Rokke tell you?Uh-oh...Rokke forget too!
1�Ahahaha, Rokke just make funny, yes?Hume woman up above, in southwest chamber. You remember well now, yeees?
1�You back? You want Rokke tell you another joke?An imp, an Ahriman, and a ruszor walk into a tavern, yes...?
1�You trust Rokke, yes?Rokke no lie to no one.
1�Oh, so one of the others helped you.That's just great. Wonderful. Bully for you.
1�Look who's back, after blowin' me off the last time.What did you want again? And why should I care?
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.The Truth Lies Hid(pt.1).The Truth Lies Hid(pt.2).The Truth Lies Hid(pt.3).The Truth Lies Hid(pt.4).The Truth Lies Hid(pt.5).The Truth Lies Hid(pt.6).The Truth Lies Hid(pt.7).The Truth Lies Hid(pt.8).Bonds of Mythril(pt.1).Bonds of Mythril(pt.2).
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
